name: Sliding Puzzle Hero
description:
After years of travelling far from home, you receive bad news: your sister is very sick. Set out on a last travel to find the antidote and safe your sister from the Death.

How to play?

This game is based on turns. After you play your turn (making as much movements as possible), the hero will move to an adjacent road (if it exists).
